        *   If correct, proceed to the next level with increased difficulty.
        *   If incorrect, allow the player to try again without losing the game.
    *   Implement the color display and input mechanism (e.g., using buttons or touchable elements).
4.  **Level Progression:** Implement the logic to increase the difficulty of the game as the player progresses through levels. This could involve increasing the length of the color sequence, decreasing the display time, or using more similar colors.

## 🎮 Game Features

### ✨ Core Gameplay
- **Infinite Levels**: The game progressively gets harder with each level
- **No Losing**: Players can keep trying until they get the sequence right - no game over!
- **Color Memory**: Watch a sequence of colors light up, then repeat it
- **Progressive Difficulty**:
  - Sequences get longer (starts at 3 colors, adds 1 per level)
  - More colors unlock as you progress (starts with 4, up to 8 colors)
  - Display time gets faster as levels increase

### 🎯 Game Mechanics
- **Level 1**: 3 colors in sequence, 4 available colors
- **Level 3+**: 5 colors in sequence, 5 available colors
- **Level 6+**: 8 colors in sequence, 6 available colors
- **Level 9+**: 11 colors in sequence, 7 available colors
- **Level 12+**: 14 colors in sequence, all 8 colors available

### 📊 Features
- Score tracking (level × 10 points per completion)
- High score persistence using AsyncStorage
- Visual progress indicators showing your position in the sequence
- Smooth animations and haptic feedback (iOS)
- Beautiful color palette with 8 distinct colors
- Responsive design that works on all screen sizes

### 🎨 UI/UX
- Clean, modern interface with the specified color scheme
- Animated color buttons that pulse when showing the sequence
- Real-time feedback (correct/incorrect indicators)
- Stats display showing level, score, high score, and sequence length
- Comprehensive home screen with game instructions

### 📱 Platform Support
- iOS-specific files with proper safe area handling
- Android support with appropriate padding
- Haptic feedback on iOS for enhanced experience
- Smooth animations using React Native Animated API

The game is now ready to play! Just tap "Start Playing" on the home screen to begin your color memory journey. The game will automatically save your high score and you can keep playing indefinitely, with each level presenting a new challenge! 🎨✨
